entities.name: draco
entities.description: The person who is being ordered to kill Dumbledore. He looks terrified and hesitant.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: An old man with weaker resistance and slower reflexes. He is being threatened by the Death Eater.

entities.name: amyus
entities.description: A Death Eater who is violent and impatient. He is threatening Dumbledore and ordering Draco to kill him.

relationships.description: Draco is being ordered by Amycus to kill Dumbledore.
Amycus is threatening and intimidating Dumbledore.
Amycus orders Draco to kill Dumbledore.
